AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Raymond McMillon: involved in a law case, raising issues on appeal including motion to dismiss the indictment and sufficiency of evidence
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Luis Pena: United States Border Patrol Agent who approached the driver-side door of the tractor-trailer and questioned Zeba Williams and Ramon De La Cruz
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Zeba Williams: co-defendant of Raymond McMillon, driver of the tractor-trailer at the immigration checkpoint stop
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Ramon De La Cruz: defendant who was sentenced to 41 months' imprisonment and appealed the decision, arguing that United States Border Patrol Agent's immigration questions unlawfully extended the duration of the immigration checkpoint stop, claimed possessory interest in the tractor-trailer
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Manuel Hernandez: United States Border Patrol Agent who prepared to have his canine perform a sniff of the tractor-trailer's exterior steps
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States District Court: court where Raymond McMillon's case was heard
